content.json: >**NOTE:** This workbook uses a parser based on a Kusto Function to normalize fields. [Follow these steps](https://aka.ms/sentinel-SlackAuditAPI-parser) to create the Kusto function alias **SlackAudit**.

content.query:
SlackAudit 
| extend evt_time = unixtime_seconds_todatetime(EventEndTime)
| where evt_time {TimeRange}
 | where Action startswith "user" | summarize count() by Action
content.title: Users Action Chart
Successful Logins over Time
Failed Logins over Time

content.query:
SlackAudit | extend evt_time = unixtime_seconds_todatetime(EventEndTime)
| where evt_time {TimeRange}
| where Action == "user_login"
| summarize Login = count() by Time=evt_time, Email=ActorUserEmail, Context_Domain_Location=ContextLocationDomain, IP=ContextIpAddress, ContextLocationName = ContextLocationName | sort by Time
content.title: Login Activity

content.query:
SlackAudit | extend evt_time = unixtime_seconds_todatetime(EventEndTime)
| where evt_time {TimeRange}
| where Action == "user_created"
| project Time=evt_time, Email=ActorUserEmail, Context_Domain_Location=ContextLocationDomain, IP=ContextIpAddress, ContextLocationName = ContextLocationName,Created_User=EntityUserEmail, Action, ActionDescription | sort by Time
content.title: Users Created
New Guest Users Activity Timechart

content.query:
SlackAudit | extend evt_time = unixtime_seconds_todatetime(EventEndTime)
| where evt_time {TimeRange}
| where Action == "user_deactivated"
| project Time=evt_time, Email=ActorUserEmail, Context_Domain_Location=ContextLocationDomain, IP=ContextIpAddress, ContextLocationName = ContextLocationName,Deactivated_User=EntityUserEmail, Action, ActionDescription | sort by Time
content.title: Users Deactivated
New Guest Users Activity

content.query:
SlackAudit
 | extend evt_time = unixtime_seconds_todatetime(EventEndTime)
 | where evt_time {TimeRange}
 | where Action == "app_installed" or Action == "app_approved" or Action == "app_restricted"
 | extend Action = case(Action == "app_installed", "Applications Installed", 
                       Action == "app_approved", "Applications Approved", 
                       "Applications Restricted")
 | summarize count() by Action
content.title: Application Actions

content.query:
SlackAudit
 | extend evt_time = unixtime_seconds_todatetime(EventEndTime)
 | where evt_time {TimeRange}
 | where Action == "app_installed"
 |  project Time=evt_time, ActorUserEmail, Context_Domain_Location=ContextLocationDomain, IP=ContextIpAddress, ContextLocationName = ContextLocationName, Action, ActionDescription, AppScopes =EntityAppScopes, App=EntityAppName 
 | summarize Count=count() by App | sort by Count desc
content.title: Apps Installed Chart

content.query:
SlackAudit
 | extend evt_time = unixtime_seconds_todatetime(EventEndTime)
 | where evt_time {TimeRange}
 | where Action == "app_installed"
 |  project Time=evt_time, ActorUserEmail, Context_Domain_Location=ContextLocationDomain, IP=ContextIpAddress, ContextLocationName = ContextLocationName, Action, ActionDescription, AppScopes =EntityAppScopes, App=EntityAppName | sort by Time
content.title: Apps Installed

content.query:
SlackAudit
 | extend evt_time = unixtime_seconds_todatetime(EventEndTime)
 | where evt_time {TimeRange}
 | where Action == "app_restricted"
 |  project Time=evt_time, ActorUserEmail, Context_Domain_Location=ContextLocationDomain, IP=ContextIpAddress, ContextLocationName = ContextLocationName, Action, ActionDescription, AppScopes =EntityAppScopes, App=EntityAppName | sort by Time
content.title: Apps Restricted

content.query:
SlackAudit
 | extend evt_time = unixtime_seconds_todatetime(EventEndTime)
 | where evt_time {TimeRange}
 | where Action == "app_restricted"
 |  project Time=evt_time, ActorUserEmail, Context_Domain_Location=ContextLocationDomain, IP=ContextIpAddress, ContextLocationName = ContextLocationName, Action, ActionDescription, AppScopes =EntityAppScopes, App=EntityAppName 
 | summarize Count=count() by App | sort by Count desc
content.title: Apps Restricted Chart

content.query:
SlackAudit
 | extend evt_time = unixtime_seconds_todatetime(EventEndTime)
 | where evt_time {TimeRange}
 | where Action == "app_approved"
 |  project Time=evt_time, ActorUserEmail, Context_Domain_Location=ContextLocationDomain, IP=ContextIpAddress, ContextLocationName = ContextLocationName, Action, ActionDescription, AppScopes =EntityAppScopes, App=EntityAppName | sort by Time
content.title: Apps Approved

content.query:
SlackAudit
 | extend evt_time = unixtime_seconds_todatetime(EventEndTime)
 | where evt_time {TimeRange}
 | where Action == "app_approved"
 |  project Time=evt_time, ActorUserEmail, Context_Domain_Location=ContextLocationDomain, IP=ContextIpAddress, ContextLocationName = ContextLocationName, Action, ActionDescription, AppScopes =EntityAppScopes, App=EntityAppName 
 | summarize Count=count() by App | sort by Count desc
content.title: Apps Approved Chart

content.query:
SlackAudit
 | extend evt_time = unixtime_seconds_todatetime(EventEndTime)
 | where evt_time {TimeRange}
 | where Action == "file_downloaded" or Action == "file_uploaded" or Action == "file_shared" or Action == "file_public_link_created" or Action == "file_public_link_revoked" or Action == "file_downloaded_blocked"
 | extend Action = case(Action == "file_downloaded", "Downloaded", Action == "file_uploaded", "Uploaded", Action == "file_shared","Shared", Action == "file_public_link_created", "Public Link Created",Action == "file_public_link_revoked", "Public Link Revoked","Download Blocked" )
 | summarize count() by Action | sort by count_ desc
content.title: File Actions
File Downloads Activity TImechart

content.query:
SlackAudit
 | extend evt_time = unixtime_seconds_todatetime(EventEndTime)
 | where evt_time {TimeRange}
 | where Action == "file_downloaded"
 | project Time =evt_time, Workspace=ContextLocationName, ["File Title"] = EntityFileTitle, User = ActorUserName, Action, ActionDescription
 | sort by Time desc | take 100
content.title: File Downloads Activity

content.query:
SlackAudit
 | extend evt_time = unixtime_seconds_todatetime(EventEndTime)
 | where Action == "file_uploaded"
 | make-series Trend = count() on evt_time from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by ActorUserEmail;
content.title: File Uploads Activity Timechart

content.query:
SlackAudit
 | extend evt_time = unixtime_seconds_todatetime(EventEndTime)
 | where evt_time {TimeRange}
 | where Action == "file_uploaded"
 | project Time =evt_time, Workspace=ContextLocationName, ["File Title"] = EntityFileTitle, User = ActorUserName, Action, ActionDescription
 | sort by Time desc | take 100
content.title: File Uploads Activity
Shared Files Activity Timechart

content.query:
SlackAudit
 | extend evt_time = unixtime_seconds_todatetime(EventEndTime)
 | where evt_time {TimeRange}
 | where Action == "file_shared"
 | project Time =evt_time, Workspace=ContextLocationName, ["File Title"] = EntityFileTitle, User = ActorUserName, Action, ActionDescription
 | sort by Time desc | take 100
content.title: Shared Files Activity
File Public Link Created Activity Timechart

items.name: File Public Link Created Activity Timechart

content.query:
SlackAudit
 | extend evt_time = unixtime_seconds_todatetime(EventEndTime)
 | where evt_time {TimeRange}
 | where Action == "file_public_link_created"
 | project Time =evt_time, Workspace=ContextLocationName, ["File Title"] = EntityFileTitle, User = ActorUserName, Action, ActionDescription
 | sort by Time desc | take 100
content.title: File Public Link Created Activity
File Public Link Revoked Activity Timechart

items.name: File Public Link Revoked Activity Timechart

content.query:
SlackAudit
 | extend evt_time = unixtime_seconds_todatetime(EventEndTime)
 | where evt_time {TimeRange}
 | where Action == "file_public_link_revoked"
 | project Time =evt_time, Workspace=ContextLocationName, ["File Title"] = EntityFileTitle, User = ActorUserName, Action, ActionDescription
 | sort by Time desc | take 100
content.title: File Public Link Revoked Activity

content.query:
SlackAudit | extend evt_time = unixtime_seconds_todatetime(EventEndTime)
| where Action contains "_channel_"
| summarize count() by ActionDescription | sort by count_ desc
content.title: Channels Activity

content.query:
SlackAudit | extend evt_time = unixtime_seconds_todatetime(EventEndTime)
| where evt_time {TimeRange}
| where Action contains "private_channel"
| summarize count() by ActionDescription
content.title: Private Channels Activity

content.query:
SlackAudit | extend evt_time = unixtime_seconds_todatetime(EventEndTime)
| where evt_time {TimeRange}
| where Action contains "private_channel"
| project Time=evt_time, ActorUser=ActorUserEmail, Action, ActionDescription, ["Channel Name"]= EntityChannelName, ContextLocationDomain, Ip=ContextIpAddress, EntityChannelIsShared,EntityChannelIsOrgShared
| sort by Time

SlackAudit | extend evt_time = unixtime_seconds_todatetime(EventEndTime)
| where evt_time {TimeRange}
| where Action contains "public_channel"
| summarize count() by ActionDescription
content.title: Public Channels Activity

content.query:
SlackAudit | extend evt_time = unixtime_seconds_todatetime(EventEndTime)
| where evt_time {TimeRange}
| where Action contains "public_channel"
| project Time=evt_time, ActorUser=ActorUserEmail, Action, ActionDescription, ["Channel Name"]= EntityChannelName, ContextLocationDomain, Ip=ContextIpAddress, EntityChannelIsShared,EntityChannelIsOrgShared
| sort by Time

SlackAudit | extend evt_time = unixtime_seconds_todatetime(EventEndTime)
| where evt_time {TimeRange}
| where Action contains "guest_channel"
| summarize count() by ActionDescription
content.title: Guest Channels Activity

content.query:
SlackAudit | extend evt_time = unixtime_seconds_todatetime(EventEndTime)
| where evt_time {TimeRange}
| where Action contains "guest_channel"
| project Time=evt_time, ActorUser=ActorUserEmail, Action, ActionDescription, ["Channel Name"]= EntityChannelName, ContextLocationDomain, Ip=ContextIpAddress, EntityChannelIsShared,EntityChannelIsOrgShared
| sort by Time
